actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: To abrogate off-reservation, usufructuary rights of Indian tribes to hunt, fish, and gather in the State of Wisconsin.

summary.text: Abrogates any off-reservation, usufructuary right to hunt, fish, and gather granted to any Indian tribe by any treaty, law, executive order, or Federal court order which may be exercised in the State of Wisconsin.

titles.title: To abrogate off-reservation, usufructuary rights of Indian tribes to hunt, fish, and gather in the State of Wisconsin.
